<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157935</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">You look familiar to me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie schauen zu mir vertraut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous semblez bien connu à moi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você olha familiar a mim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sembrate noti a me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φαίνεστε εξοικειωμένοι σε με</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted parece familiar a mí</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interesting illustrated explanation of brain research on Neural Mechanisms Involved in the Identification of Human Faces</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neurology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Interessieren veranschaulichte Erklärung der 
Gehirnforschung auf den neuralen Einheiten, die in das Kennzeichen der
menschlichen Gesichter mit einbezogen wurden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intéresser a illustré l'explication de la 
recherche de cerveau sur les mécanismes neuraux impliqués dans 
l'identification des visages humains</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interessar ilustrou a explanação da pesquisa do 
cérebro sobre os mecanismos neural envolvidos na identificação das 
caras humanas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interessare ha illustrato la spiegazione di 
ricerca del cervello sui meccanismi neurali addetti 
all'identificazione delle facce umane</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ενδιαφέρει επεξήγησε την εξήγηση της έρευνας 
εγκεφάλου για τους νευρικούς μηχανισμούς που περιλαμβάνονται στον 
προσδιορισμό των ανθρώπινων προσώπων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El interesar ilustró la explicación de la 
investigación del cerebro sobre los mecanismos de los nervios 
implicados en la identificación de caras humanas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neurologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anerkennung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">neurologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">identification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">neurology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cervello</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">neurologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riconoscimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκέφαλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νευρολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reconocimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
